AlteredGfxList Class Reference

Class holding a list of modifications to the GfxData coordinates of the RoutableItems of a route to send to a navigator. More...

Detailed Description

Class holding a list of modifications to the GfxData coordinates of the RoutableItems of a route to send to a navigator.

Member Function Documentation

bool AlteredGfxList::checkNewCoord (  GfxData *  gfx,
bool  begining,
int32 &  newLat,
int32 &  newLon
)  [private]
 

Check the GfxData if the second coordinate from the end or begining is more than 5 meters in.

If so return the coordinates for the point between the end/begining and the second pont, 5 meters from the end/begining.

Parameters:
gfx The GfxData to check.
begining True if checking the beginning. False if the end.
newLat The output lat. MAX_INT32 if not set.
newLon The output lon. MAX_INT32 if not set.
Returns:
True if a new coordinate was set.

AlteredGfxLink* AlteredGfxList::getItemInList (  uint32  itemId  ) 
 

Search the list for a link belonging to the itemId.

Parameters:
itemId The Id of the searche item.
Returns:
Pointer to the link of the item.

bool AlteredGfxList::removeFirstCoord (  uint32  nodeId,
int32 &  newLat,
int32 &  newlon
) 
 

If this method returns true, the first coordinate {of the GfxData} should not be sent to the navigator.

If the outparameters newLat and newlon are set( not MAX_INT32). This new coordinate should be sent instead

Parameters:
nodeId The Id of the first node of the item being passed.
newLat The lat of the new coordinate to add first in the route.
newlon The lon of the new coordinate to add first in the route.
Returns:
True if first coordinate should be removed.

bool AlteredGfxList::removeLastCoord (  uint32  nodeId,
int32 &  newLat,
int32 &  newlon
) 
 

If this method returns true, the first coordinate {of the GfxData} should not be sent to the navigator.

If the outparameters newLat and newlon are set( not MAX_INT32). This new coordinate should be sent instead

Parameters:
nodeId The Id of the first node of the item being passed.
newLat The lat of the new coordinate to add last in the route.
newlon The lon of the new coordinate to add last in the route.
Returns:
True if first coordinate should be removed.

void AlteredGfxList::setRemoveFirstCoordinate (  uint32  nodeId,
GfxData *  gfx
) 
 

Finds the Item in the list or creates a new link for the item.

Marks it to remove the last cordinate calculates new last coord if needed.

Parameters:
nodeId The Id of the first node of the item being passed.
gfx The GfxData of the item.

) 
 

Finds the Item in the list or creates a new link for the item.

Marks it to remove the first cordinate calculates new first coord if needed.

Parameters:
nodeId The Id of the first node of the item being passed.
gfx The GfxData of the item.
